trans-unit.source: Contains values used as identifiers for <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider"></xref>.
These identifiers are used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用这些标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent fields in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: A control should have its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> set to `false` before allowing a call to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider.SetValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 控件应将其<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty>设置为`true`及其<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty>设置为`false`之前允许到<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider.SetValue%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider.SetValue%2A>调用</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty></xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: The pattern [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified UI Automation element.
trans-unit.target: 模式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]传递给方法诸如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>若要从指定的 UI 自动化元素检索控件模式感兴趣。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>中的等效字段
